name: Eldrin Thorne
appearance: Tall and gaunt with piercing grey eyes, Eldrin wears tattered robes stained with ink and dust. A long braid of silver hair trails down his back.

stunts.name: Master of Arcane Lore
stunts.description: Rolls +4 to any skill check involving ancient magic or forgotten spells. Can recall obscure incantations and summoning rituals.

stunts.name: The Scholar's Eye
stunts.description: Can see through deception with a single glance, noticing hidden messages or coded symbols in books and scrolls.

stunts.name: Lone Wanderer
stunts.description: May always find shelter or food on the road, but must travel light. No permanent home or possessions.

quirks: Keeps a grimoire filled with scribbled notes and sketches
fears: Being hunted by cultists seeking his arcane secrets
Discovering the true cost of power
desires: Uncover lost magic to rewrite reality
Share his findings with those willing to learn

backstory.origin: Eldrin grew up in a secluded tower, where he was raised by an eccentric and reclusive mage who taught him the ways of ancient magic.
backstory.formativeEvent: A cult discovered Eldrin's hidden tower during a solar eclipse. In a desperate bid to protect his secrets, the mage sacrificed himself, leaving Eldrin alone with the burden of knowledge.
backstory.secret: Eldrin carries a single, unmarked amulet passed down from his mentor, said to contain the essence of forgotten magic.
backstory.summary: Haunted by his mentor's death and determined to uncover more lost knowledge, Eldrin sets out on a perilous journey across the shattered realms.

voice.quirks: Often trails off, lost in thought about ancient mysteries

loc-1764256027809.name: The Shattered Realms
loc-1764256027809.details: Eldrin deciphers an ancient script, revealing a reference to the lost kingdom of Eldoria and its connection to powerful arcane secrets that could reshape magic in the shattered realms.
